title: Stalin and control of national economy

content.description: “We did not have a tractor industry. Now we have one. We did not have an automobile industry. Now we have one. In the output of electric power we were last on the list. Now we rank among the first. In the output of oil products and coal we were last on the list. Now we rank among the first.And as a result of all of this our country has been converted from an agrarian into an industrial country.”
content.question: Joseph Stalin, Soviet Union, 1933 The economic development Stalin describes above was achieved primarily through which of the following?

choices.label: Government control of the national economy
Extensive trade with the United States
Creation of private companies by Russian entrepreneurs

content.answer: Government control of the national economy

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
